meanings.sent1: The wanter eagerly looked at the toy in the store.
meanings.sent2: The child was a wanter of candies.
meanings.sent3: The wanter in the movie kept chasing after a magical gem.
meanings.sent4: She was a wanter of adventure, always seeking new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The wanter's eyes sparkled with longing as they gazed at the delicious cake.

meanings.definition: To desire or wish for something.
meanings.sent1: I wanter a new bike for my birthday.
meanings.sent2: She wanter to travel the world and see new places.
meanings.sent3: The cat wanter to catch the elusive mouse but kept failing.
meanings.sent4: His heart wanter for the love he had lost long ago.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden wanter for the warmth of the sun to bloom beautifully.
